## Item class

A representation of an in-game item.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Item 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, id, data)](./shieldbow.item._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Item</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [availability](./shieldbow.item.availability.md) |  | [GameMap](./shieldbow.gamemap.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The list of maps on which you can buy this item. |
|  [consumable](./shieldbow.item.consumable.md) |  | boolean | Whether this item is a consumable.<!-- -->Consumables give you temporary buffs or vision after consumption. |
|  [consumeOnFull](./shieldbow.item.consumeonfull.md) |  | boolean | Whether this item is automatically consumed if you do not have an available item slot. |
|  [description](./shieldbow.item.description.md) |  | string | A short-description of this object. <code>plaintext</code> attribute in the data dragon file. |
|  [details](./shieldbow.item.details.md) |  | string | More detailed description of the item. This is the processed details. With all the HTML-like tags removed.<!-- -->See [rawDetails](./shieldbow.item.rawdetails.md) if you want the raw data. |
|  [from](./shieldbow.item.from.md) |  | Collection&lt;string, [Item](./shieldbow.item.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The components of this item. You need to buy these item and spend additional gold to get this item. |
|  [goldValue](./shieldbow.item.goldvalue.md) |  | { base: number; total: number; sell: number; } | The value of this item in terms of in-game gold. |
|  [hideFromAll](./shieldbow.item.hidefromall.md) |  | boolean | Whether this item can be bought from the store. |
|  [id](./shieldbow.item.id.md) |  | string | The 4-digit unique ID (numerical ID as a string) of the item. |
|  [image](./shieldbow.item.image.md) |  | string | A link to the image assigned to this item in-game. |
|  [inStore](./shieldbow.item.instore.md) |  | boolean | Whether this item is listed in the in-game store. |
|  [into](./shieldbow.item.into.md) |  | Collection&lt;string, [Item](./shieldbow.item.md)<!-- -->&gt; | A collection of items the current item is a component of. |
|  [kind](./shieldbow.item.kind.md) |  | 'Basic' \| 'Epic' \| 'Legendary' \| 'Mythic' | The kind of item this is in-game. By default, all items are set to be <code>Basic</code>. There might be some issues with items that do not have their <code>depth</code> set in the data dragon JSON. |
|  [name](./shieldbow.item.name.md) |  | string | The displayed name of this item. |
|  [rawDetails](./shieldbow.item.rawdetails.md) |  | string | More detailed description of the item. Raw details contain some html-like tags. This is the raw details from the data dragon API.<!-- -->See [details](./shieldbow.item.details.md) if you want to see it with the tags processed out. |
|  [requiredChampion](./shieldbow.item.requiredchampion.md) |  | [Champion](./shieldbow.champion.md) \| undefined | If this is not undefined, then this item can only be bought/owned by this champion. |
|  [specialRecipe](./shieldbow.item.specialrecipe.md) |  | [Item](./shieldbow.item.md) \| undefined | If this is not undefined, you cannot buy this item from the store. Instead, you need to buy the <code>specialRecipe</code> item and complete a quest to get it. |
|  [stacks?](./shieldbow.item.stacks.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> If this has a value, it means this item can be stacked in the same item slot. The value indicates the quantity of this item you can store in one slot. |
|  [stats](./shieldbow.item.stats.md) |  | { \[key: string\]: number; } | A list of stats this item provides. To learn more about these stats, [documentation](https://developer.riotgames.com/docs/lol#data-dragon_items) |
|  [tags](./shieldbow.item.tags.md) |  | string\[\] | Some tags assigned to this item. |
